The History of ManiaxPioneers of Axe Throwing in Quebec

Since 2015
One of the best indoor activities in Quebec.

Maniax® was the very first axe throwing center to open in Quebec.


Come and find out why Maniax® is now ranked among the best activities to do in Laval.

A Formula for Everyone!

Whether you're a seasoned athlete or simply curious to explore this activity that's making a buzz, you have a spot with us.

Tailored Packages

Take advantage of our various packages to engage in indoor activities without compromise.

Group activity

Maniax® offers the most entertaining indoor activity for sharing an extraordinary moment that you won't soon forget!
